title: The Night Manager
description: This “splendidly exciting, finely told” New York Times bestseller (The New York Times Book Review) inspired an Emmy Award–winning series starring Olivia Colman and Tom Hiddleston! In the wake of the Cold War, British veteran Jonathan Pine collides with a powerful arms dealer — and will stop at nothing to bring down the dangerous criminal empire. Read by the author.
author: John Le Carré
